name: Bug Brawl
description:
You're a ladybug and this flower is your whole small world! Other ladybugs want to take your world from you, stop them by any means necessary!

This is an Online Multiplayer game, you can choose between duking it out with other players on the Arena mode or you can play by yourself on the Survival mode and see how long you can last against waves of AI ladybugs! (It's also online though, so even on survival other players might show up to try and steal your turf!)

This game was made originally for the Ludum Dare #38 Game Jam

If you want someone to play with, join our discord, if someone from our team is around we'll be happy to join ya :D

Created by Daniel Snd and Kristina Vandale with music & sfx by Thiago Adamo.
